casebody.data:
Janice HART-GALLIMORE, as Personal Representative of the Estate of Randy L. Hart, Appellant,
v.
MICHELIN NORTH AMERICA, INC., a Foreign Corporation, Tire Centers, LLC, a Foreign Limited Liability Company, Mack Trucks, Inc., a Foreign Corporation, and Southern Waste Systems, LLC, a Florida Limited Liability Company, Appellees. No. 3D16-2887 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Third District. Opinion filed May 2, 2018

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
